title: FS/FT T206 SGC Sovereign and Old Mill
author: Joem36

posts.post_title: FS/FT T206 SGC Sovereign and Old Mill
posts.post_content:
Hi, I have for sale or trade 6 SGC T206 Cards. I'm willing to trade for any stamped back T206 that helps me in my project. I'm trying to put the T206 set together now with a stamp on the back of each one. 

I also have the price for each card. If your purchase a card I would like to be paid with a paypal gift to [url]lisajoe97@yahoo.com[/url]. The price includes the shipping. Thanks

SGC 40 Ed Konetchy (Glove Near Ground) Sovereign 350 (SOLD)
SGC 40 George Stone Sovereign 350 (SOLD)
SGC 40 Bill Chappelle Sovereign 350 (SOLD)
SGC 35 Doc Casey Old Mill (small stain on back) $32.00
SGC 30 Fred Mitchell Sovereign 350 (SOLD)
SGC 20 Bill Bradley (small specs of paper loss on back) Sovereign 150 (SOLD)



Joe
